SEARCH
Module paths
Package ntnu.idatt2001.ejhaslerjorgfi.util

Class FileHandler

java.lang.Object
ntnu.idatt2001.ejhaslerjorgfi.util.FileHandler
public class FileHandler extends Object

FileHandler

Represents a tool for reading *.paths files. It is capable of opening a file which contains a textual representation of a story and parse it into a Story instance which can be loaded as a new Game.

Upon successfull reading from a file, it will return the boolean value true, indicating that the operation was executed properly. Should there occur an error which prevents the FileHandler to read a file, the boolean value false will be returned as well as storing the error message received so that the user of the application can read the stacktrace if the user so pleases.

All methods and variables in the FileHandler class is set to static. It is intended for the FileHandler class to be a static class, allowing to take advantage of the functionality of the class without initializing an instance of the Filehandler.

Since:
28.02.2023

28.02.2023

      Read an existent Story from a .paths file and load it as a new Game instance.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the file has an invalid extension.
